data.name: Heard of the Story?
data.detailed_description:
Heard of the Story? is a third-person simulation game about human connection, fantasy world exploration, and medieval town-building.

Travelling from coast to valley through cobbled paths, you arrive at a small but promising village in the middle of a beautiful natural landscape. Each villager you'll find in this cottagecore is powered by complex artificial intelligence that allows for unique procedural behaviour, learning, and change.

Lead your town to prosperity; transform it into the capital of the country. Or simply lay back; eat an apple whilst enjoying the view of brawls, innovations, and progress. The path ahead is yours to choose.

Regardless of your decision, as the sun sets above the horizon, there will always be a community that waits for you back in the village. They’ll be excited to share their latest adventures and drama with you (well, most of them). Should you wish to help them with their problems, they'll be forever grateful.

Features


Explore to gather resources in a randomly generated world.
Beyond the village lay forests, fields, and mountains - each with their fruit and treasure. Explore the procedurally generated landscape to gather and discover a source of profit for a town, or to find a colourful place to frolic amidst long grass and arrays of countless flowers.

Talk to villagers to discover their unique experiences, personality, and dreams.
They'll give you useful info, sometimes, they might also ask you why their friend is so obsessed with crafting long-swords. Small talk about relationships, past events, goals, skills, and various opinions. Tell them what you think about their ideas and influence their lives.

Help them by completing quests based on real simulated desires.
Villagers are driven by hunger, pleasure, and of course, what they know. Sometimes they'll struggle or won't know how to get there. Build up a relationship by helping them. They'll then tell you stories and perhaps help you when you need it.

Build up a small village to a bustling castle town.
Gather resources to construct new buildings, walls, and even a castle if you dare. With more houses and a prospering village, new villagers will be eager to immigrate and join. Build a forge or library to improve skills and possibilities. Get the villagers to help, you don't have to do it alone.

Craft your way up to an expert, perhaps a blacksmith?
Discover new recipes through sparks of creative genius, or leverage the wisdom of your peers to learn how to craft even the most complex of tools or toys. Specialise into a role and provide your village with crucial items. Complete your work by crafting a masterpiece.

Watch as villagers go about their daily life autonomously.
Filled with needs, personality, thoughts, and knowledge, each villager will go on to develop a unique life-style of their own. Perhaps they'll be really interested in crafting, or perhaps they'll be lazy and lay around watching the clouds all day. As the village fills with more and more villagers, watch the orchestra of life play.

Keep warm with a fireplace and listen to endless stories.
As the villagers go about their day, they'll encounter new experiences and conflict. Some of these will have deep impacts on their lives - they'll tell you how and why. Perhaps an accident while chopping wood, a danger lurking in the forest, a cooking disaster or miracle. Or will they tell a story about you?

data.short_description: Forge a medieval community with intelligent AI villagers. Gather resources and transform the village into a town, or simply listen to captivating stories from various simulated and evolving lives. All in a beautiful, relaxing, and immersive fantasy world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
